name: People Interactive (India)
overview:
People Interactive is the Consumer Internet arm of the Anupam Mittal led People Group which owns the extremely successful matrimonial portal Shaadi.com along with real estate site Makaan.com.

People Interactive’s Shaadi.com, the World’s Largest Matrimonial Service, has also been recognized as the “Most Innovative Company in India of 2011” by Fast Company, USA – one of the world’s leading progressive business media brand. Shaadi.com has been successful globally due to the incessant innovation and user-friendly experience it provides to its members and was ranked “39 Globally Amongst the 50 Most Innovative Companies” by Fast Company. With the aid of Technology, Shaadi.com altered the route of Indian matchmaking and transformed the Indian perception on seeking life-partners online.

Makaan.com, part of People Interactive, is the fastest growing property website in India. It was founded with the mission to connect relevant buyers and sellers of real estate, massively increasing the propensity of transactions. The website is committed to help its users make wise and profitable decisions relating to buying, selling, renting and leasing of properties in India and key global geographies.
